subject: Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: Steven Holcomb and Steve Langton of the United States won a two-man bobsled World Cup race in Lake Placid, N.Y., giving Holcomb five straight wins to start the season.
snippet: Steven Holcomb and Steve Langton of the United States won a two-man bobsled World Cup race in Lake Placid, N.Y., giving Holcomb five straight wins to start the season.
